section.section: The Governor shall appoint the Council members with the advice of the Secretary and the advice and consent of the Senate.
The term of a member is 3 years.
The terms of members are staggered as required by the terms provided for members of the Council on July 1, 1986.
At the end of a term, a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed.

Members of the Council:
Are eligible for reappointment; but
May not serve more than 2 full consecutive terms.

text.section: The Governor may remove a member for incompetence or misconduct.
